name: com.unity.xr.visionos
description:
Provides support for Apple visionOS XR features. This includes build post-processing code and the following subsystem implementations:
  - XRSessionSubsystem
  - XRDisplaySubsystem
  - XRInputSubsystem
  - XRMeshSubsystem
  - XRPlaneSubsystem
  - XRImageTrackingSubsystem
  - XRAnchorSubsystem
  - XRHandSubsystem
Unity PolySpatial and visionOS support is only available to Unity Pro, Unity Enterprise, and Unity Industry users. Learn more about these plans at unity.com/pricing.

samples.description: A sample scene and supporting assets for the built-in render pipeline demonstrating VR features.
A sample scene and supporting assets for the Universal Render Pipeline demonstrating VR features.
